price: Whoever Allah causes to stray, there is none to guide him; He will leave them to wander blindly in their transgression.
arabic: مَن يُضۡلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَلَا هَادِيَ لَهُۥۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِي طُغۡيَٰنِهِمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ
